member.name: T:UnityEditor.UI.GraphicEditor
member.summary: Editor class used to edit UI Graphics. Extend this class to write your own graphic editor.

member.name: M:UnityEditor.UI.GraphicEditor.SetShowNativeSize(System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Set if the 'Set Native Size' button should be visible for this editor.
member.param: Are we showing or hiding the AnimBool for the size.
Should the size AnimBool change instantly.

member.name: M:UnityEditor.UI.GraphicEditor.NativeSizeButtonGUI
member.summary: GUI for showing a button that sets the size of the RectTransform to the native size for this Graphic.

member.name: M:UnityEditor.UI.GraphicEditor.AppearanceControlsGUI
member.summary: GUI related to the appearance of the Graphic. Color and Material properties appear here.

member.name: M:UnityEditor.UI.GraphicEditor.RaycastControlsGUI
member.summary: GUI related to the Raycasting settings for the graphic.

member.name: T:UnityEditor.UI.SpriteDrawUtility
member.summary: PropertyDrawer for [[SpriteState]]. This is a PropertyDrawer for SpriteState it is implemented using the standard unity PropertyDrawer framework.

member.summary: This script adds the UI menu options to the Unity Editor.

member.name: T:UnityEditor.UI.SelfControllerEditor
